Text: Slapper detonator:  It is an improvement of the earlier exploding-bridgewe

Triplets:<Slapper detonator
2:
--------------------
Text: Slapper detonator:  Normally all the slapper's kinetic energy is supplied only by the heating (and hence expansion) of the plasma (the former foil) by the current passing through it, though constructions with a "back strap" to further drive the plasma forward by magnetic field exist too.
Triplets:<Slapper
3:
--------------------
Text: Slapper detonator:  This assembly is quite efficient; up to 30% of the electrical energy can be converted to the slapper's kinetic energy.
